{{NCAATeamFootballSeason |Year = 2008 |Team = Troy Trojans | Image = |ImageSize = 130px | Conference = Sun Belt Conference |ShortConference = SBC |CoachRank = | APRank = | BCSRank = | Record = 8-5 | ConfRecord = 6â1 | HeadCoach = [[Larry Blakeney]] | OffCoach = [[Neal Brown]] | DefCoach = Jeremy Rowell | OScheme = [[Offensive_philosophy_(American_football)#The_Spread|Spread]] | DScheme = [[Nickel_defense#Nickel_formation|4-2-5 Nickel]] | StadiumArena = [[Movie Gallery Stadium]] | Champion = Sun Belt Conference Champions | BowlTourney = [[2008 New Orleans Bowl]] |BowlTourneyResult = L 30-27 v. {{cfb link|year=2008|team=Southern Miss Golden Eagles|title=Southern Miss}} | ConfChamp= | ConfChampResult= }} {{2008 Sun Belt football standings}} The '''2008 Troy Trojans football team''' represented [[Troy University]] in the [[college football]] [[2008 NCAA Division I-BS football season|season of 2008â2009]]. The Trojans played their home games at [[Movie Gallery Stadium]] in [[Troy, Alabama|Troy]], [[Alabama]] and competed in the [[Sun Belt Conference]]. The Trojans successfully defended their [[Sun Belt Conference|Sun Belt]] Championship, winning their third in a row. Troy was coming off an 8-4 record in 2007. ==Schedule== {{CFB Schedule Start|rankyear=2008|tv=|attend=yes}} {{CFB Schedule Entry | date = August 28 | time = 6:30PM CST | w/l = w | nonconf = no | away
